column5: Was out with James Meger(M.E.E.G.S) and Rhybak on Simcoe yesterday. Started out slow but picked up with action most of the day. First fish was a 10" SMELT....no smelt in Simcoe...LOL.... Next caught a laker and then 2 whities for me. Rhybak caught 2 as well and James  caught and lost quite a few with one snap off  :o and only put one on the ice. Fish were coming through every so often. . All the fish I cleaned were JAMMED full of minnows in the 2.5 to 3" range. Good day out for sure. Here's some pics.         Nice way to start 2 months of white fish season.... ;D
nice fish and report, what depth did u find them?
good job! i cant wait to get out for some
Nice report, I'm hoping to try ice-fishing for the 2nd time ever soon...  Mike
Good Job guys, WOW!!!  What a day.  Thanks for the report.  Joey
I hear ya Mike!... You go get'um Bubba!  Great report and pics GBF!!!

Awesome catch bud. Sure cant beat those jigs. James makes a great product.I,ll be picking up a new batch of colors this weekend. Going to give those mini m e e g s a try for some crappie.   Thanks for sharing.
Great report and pics!  Looks like a great day all-around!
Thats what a simcoe whitey looks like,nice mess of fish WTG.  Steve
Well done Andy, nice looking fish!
NIce report. W2G. Nice fish    jordan
Nice report Andy. I'm glad I was part of it.
nice! Those are some good looking fish!
are those the new jigs in the box on the left?, i've never seen the ones with the bigger detailed eyes, they look good!!
Woodro,James has been experimenting with different things on his jigs.What ever he,s doing, seems to be working.
